result.title: PortForward Dashboard report
result.description: D65 The PortForward Dashboard PFD is one of the main tools of Decision Support System This multidimensional instrument allows a proactive managing of port operations through the definition of specific indicators for the monitoring of port performances in different aspects such as Logistics and Port Operations Socioeconomic Impact Environmental management etc The report will demonstrate the realization of the tool with respect to requirements such as interoperability meaning the cooperation among different tools through standardization methods integration meaning the ability of the dashboard to share information with other existing platforms scalability meaning the possibility to add in the future additional features and capabilitiesT64
